DataElement.preferredName: Neck Dissection Impairment Index Past Four Weeks How Much Bothered by Overall Activity Level Because of Shoulder or Neck 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how much they have been bothered by their overall activity level because of their shoulder or neck over the past four weeks as a result of the cancer treatment of their neck, using an five point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Neck Dissection Impairment Index Past Four Weeks How Much Bothered by Overall Activity Level Because of Shoulder or Neck
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A health-related instrument to identify the factors that affect quality of life related to shoulder dysfunction following neck dissection for head and neck cancers._Past; before the present time._A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one._Any period of seven consecutive days._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A question about whether an individual is or was bothered by overall activity level because of their shoulder or neck.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A health-related instrument to identify the factors that affect quality of life related to shoulder dysfunction following neck dissection for head and neck cancers.

Concepts.definition: A health-related instrument to identify the factors that affect quality of life related to shoulder dysfunction following neck dissection for head and neck cancers.

Property.preferredName: Past Four Week Quantity Bothered by Overall Activity Level Because of Shoulder or Neck
Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.:Any period of seven consecutive days.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:A question about whether an individual is or was bothered by overall activity level because of their shoulder or neck.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.

Concepts.longName: Bothered by Overall Activity Level Because of Shoulder or Neck
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual is or was bothered by overall activity level because of their shoulder or neck.
